title: Quartile Calculator – Q1, Median, Q3, IQR & Outliers

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Formulas used IQR = Q3 − Q1 Lower fence = Q1 − 1.5 × IQR Upper fence = Q3 + 1.5 × IQR Values outside these fences are marked as outliers in boxplots and summary tables.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Core relationships IQR = Q3 − Q1 Lower fence = Q1 − 1.5 × IQR Upper fence = Q3 + 1.5 × IQR Any observation below the lower fence or above the upper fence is flagged as a potential outlier according to Tukey’s rule.
